# An introduction to simpleCache


```{r Try it out}
library(simpleCache)
setCacheDir("~")
simpleCache("normSample", "rnorm(1e7, 0,1)", recreate=TRUE)
simpleCache("normSample", "rnorm(1e7, 0,1)")
```
